link: Colin Barker, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,2,1).
maple: seq(coeff(S, x, j), j=1..m); # _G. C. Greubel_, Apr 14 2021
program: (Magma) [n le 3 select (1-(-1)^n)/2 else Self(n-1) +2*Self(n-2) +Self(n-3): n in [1..50]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Apr 14 2021
